en: His tough attitude made the other side have to submit.
pinyin: Tā de qiáng yìng zī tài shǐ duì fāng bù dé bù sòng fú.

en: fāng néng jīn bǎng tí míng) - Study hard every day, only then you can achieve success and have your name listed on the gold board.
pinyin: 方能金榜题名。 (hǎo hǎo xué xí, tiān tiān xiàng shàng

en: dāng kě jīn bǎng tí míng) - Today's hard work will pave the way for tomorrow's success, which may lead to your name being written on the golden list.
pinyin: 当可金榜题名。 (jīn rì zhī gōng, míng rì bì chéng

en: A good saw blade can make sawing work easier.
pinyin: hǎo jù piàn néng ràng jù zi de gōng zuò biàn de gèng jiā qīng sōng.

en: This saw blade is already too dull, it should be replaced as soon as possible.
pinyin: zhè bǎ jù piàn yǐ jīng tài dùn le，yào jìn kuài gēng huàn.

en: This kind of saw blade is suitable for cutting metal.
pinyin: zhè zhǒng jù piàn shì hé yòng lái jù jīn shǔ.

en: Delicious 饎 dishes leave a lasting taste in one's mouth.
pinyin: hǎo chī de chì shí ràng rén kǒu gǎn liú yú

en: During the holiday season, every household makes delicious 饎 dishes.
pinyin: nián jié qī jiān, jiā jiā hù hù dōu yào zhì zuò měi wèi de chì shí

en: The specialty of this restaurant is 饎 dishes with authentic flavors.
pinyin: zhè jiā cān tīng de tè sè jiù shì kǒu wèi dì dào de chì shí

en: Curiosity drove me to search for the Black-headed Bunting.
pinyin: Hǎoqíxīn qūshǐ wǒ qù xúnzhǎo hēitóu làzuǐ què.

en: The Black-headed Bunting is a beautiful little bird.
pinyin: Hēitóu làzuǐ què shì yī zhǒng yōuměi de xiǎoniǎo.

en: I once saw a Black-headed Bunting in the woods.
pinyin: Wǒ céng zài lín jiān kàn dào yī zhī hēitóu làzuǐ què.
